titles.title: Hospital Emergency Assistance Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide for reimbursement of certain for-profit hospitals.
Hospital Emergency Assistance Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Hospital Emergency Assistance Act of 2005 - Authorizes the President to provide reimbursement to a for-profit hospital for damages to, or an expense incurred by, it during a major disaster or emergency.
